raw_text: ADHIHETTY,​ HIRAN at Rest. Much loved husband of Felicia,​ darling dad of Natasha,​ loving father-in-law of Shehan Perera,​ adored grandfather of Joshua and Tahlia,​ brother of Nirmala,​ Yasmin and Sandhya. Funeral arrangements will be notified later.057733

DE SILVA, CHITRIKA (nee FERNANDO) – It is with great sadness we announce the passing of Chitrika de Silva. Beloved wife of late Dr. Srilal de Silva (Sri Lanka Standards Institute SLSI), ever loving mother of Ranga de Silva (son), Radhi de Silva (daughter), Heshani Perera (daughter-in-law) and Rajitha Devapriya (son-in-law). Remains lie at residence No. 49, Jayathilaka Mawatha, Panadura. Cortège leaves the residence at 4.00pm on Wednesday the 13th of September 2023. Cremation at 5.00pm at the Minuwampitiya Cemetery Panadura. 120923
